overview:
Innovatv.com is an online portal that supplies E-stores with Innovative Kitchen, Household, Health & Beauty and As Seen on TV Products; direct from China. Their aim is to help E-stores stock their shelves with hot sellable items, whilst taking advantage of cost savings.

Innovatv’s mission is to provide E-businesses a safe and easy way of by-passing wholesalers and sourcing direct from China. Our success relies on our clientsâ€™ success, so our business philosophy is focused on reducing costs for our clients and helping them to create a healthy profit margin. We aim to make it as convenient as possible for the West to tap directly into China.

The main benefits:

Flexible Orders We understand that customers have different quantity requirements, so our company is geared to handle flexible quantity orders. Our goods are consolidated and shipped across the world, so shipments are not restricted to one just Product, nor are there stringent minimum orders. We accept small to high volume orders; from the Carton to the Container load.

Customs Expertise Even if you have never imported before you need not worry. Our experience in trade is global, so regardless of the destination we will be able to provide you the adequate Customs advice. Our brokers and agents across the world are intimately familiar with national import regulations. We are able to collect all the necessary information and arrange the import process on your behalf.
